bibl.title: Words in Cipher in the Ostraka from Medinet Madi
bibl.note: A system of cryptography attested in a set of Demotic ostraka from Medinet Madi. The key to this system is simple: the Demotic number must be replaced by the corresponding Greek number in its standard alphabetical notation. Two texts (notices, 2nd cent. A.D.) are published by way of exemplification. - Pp. 241: Appendix. I. List of Greek words encrypted; - 242: Appendix II. List of Greek proper names encrypted.
bibl.seg: MENCHETTI Angiolo, Words in Cipher in the Ostraka from Medinet Madi.

A system of cryptography attested in a set of Demotic ostraka from Medinet Madi. The key to this system is simple: the Demotic number must be replaced by the corresponding Greek number in its standard alphabetical notation. Two texts (notices, 2nd cent. A.D.) are published by way of exemplification. - Pp. 241: Appendix. I. List of Greek words encrypted; - 242: Appendix II. List of Greek proper names encrypted.
